org.eclipse.jdt.ui
Application programming interfaces for interaction with the Eclipse Java User Interface.
org.eclipse.jdt.ui.text
Application programming interfaces for interaction with the Eclipse Java User Interface text support.

  • Uses of IColorManager in org.eclipse.jdt.ui

    Methods in org.eclipse.jdt.ui that return IColorManager
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static IColorManager
    JavaUI.getColorManager()
    Returns the color manager the Java UI plug-in which is used to manage any Java-specific colors needed for such things like syntax highlighting.
